Description: This townhome will be available October 5th! The eat-in kitchen is spacious and the living/dining room combination has a wood burning fireplace and access to a deck. The entire home has new blinds fresh wall-to-wall carpet and new paint. Each bedroom is spacious with lots of natural light ample closet space and a private bathroom. Laundry is easy with a washer and dryer on the main floor.

Description: Spacious three-level townhouse with finished basement and fenced-in backyard. Updated kitchen and bathrooms. Freshly painted. Hardwood on main level. Close to shopping metro stations and beltway exit. Good credit and excellent rental history required.

Description: Elegant all brick home on a quiet cul-de-sac. Wooded lot tucked mins away from shopping metro PG Comm College and I95. Enjoy peaceful/ private surroundings on the deck. Great for entertaining & surrounded by great golf courses e.g Enterprise & Glendale Golf Clubs. Master bath with 2 person jetted tub under a skylight. Energy efficient features such as a radiant barrier. 2 Fire Places!
